text: [Music]
I'm thrilled to share that a new AWS
region has opened in Switzerland the AWS
Europe Zurich region is the first region
in Switzerland and our seventh region in
Europe we established our first office
in Switzerland in Zurich in 2016
followed by Geneva in 2017 and burned
this year with the opening of the new
region we can provide customers in
Switzerland with low latency and more
flexibility when building with Advanced
AWS Technologies more than a dozen
Fortune 500 companies are headquartered
here in Switzerland such as our
customers Novartis and Roche group
furthermore small and medium-sized
Enterprises play a fundamental role in
the Swiss economy these businesses make
up over 99 of the businesses in the
country and create two-thirds of jobs in
this country not to forget as well
Switzerland has developed a vibrant
startup ecosystem Investments for
startups headed for a record in 2021 and
attracted 3.1 billion Francs in invested
capital
it shows how important the sector has
become for Switzerland especially in the
areas of fintech and health Tech more
than 10 000 active AWS customers in
Switzerland and many more across the
globe can now run their applications in
Zurich this helps our customers serve
local end users and connect cloud
services to any existing Swiss
infrastructure the new AWS region
consists of three availability zones
providing even lower latency while also
meeting local data residency
requirements for customers across
organizations from startups and
Enterprises to government universities
and non-profits we are very proud to
support us with customers many of whom
embraced our cloud services from the
early days of AWS our region is a
commitment and an investment in skills
in local jobs enabling a more
sustainable future and accelerating
economic value creation we share a
common DNA around Innovation with
Switzerland and look forward to
discovering the opportunities and
Innovations the new AWS region will
unleash for Switzerland and of course to
continuing working with our customers
and our partners to support their
Journey to the cloud
